Verses: 1 pavulum, Silvaanum, Theemoththeyum, Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukkullum Karththaraagiyayesukiristhuvukkullum Irukkira Thesalonikkeyar Sabaikku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

2 dhevanukkup Piriyamaana Sagodharare, Ungal Visuvaasaththin Kiriyaiyaiyum, Ungal Anbin Pirayaasaththaiyum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinmelulla Ungal Nambikkaiyin Porumaiyaiyum, Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukkumunbaaga Naangal Idaividaamal Ninaivukoorndhu,
4 engal Jebangalil Idaividaamal Ungalaikkuriththu Vinnappampanni, Ungalellaarukkaagavum Eppozhudhum Dhevanai Sthoththirikkirom.

5 engal Suvisesham Ungalidaththil Vasanaththodemaaththiramalla, Vallamaiyodum, Parisuththa Aaviyodum, Muzhunichchayaththodum Vandhadhu; Naangalum Ungalukkulle Irundhapodhu Ungalnimiththam Eppadippattavargalaayirundhomendru Arindhirukkireergale.
6 neengal Migundha Ubaththiravaththile, Parisuththa Aaviyin Sandhoshaththode, Thiruvasanaththai Etrukkondu, Engalaiyum Karththaraiyum Pinpatrugiravargalaagi,
7 ivvidhamaai Makkedhoniyaavilum Agaayaavilumulla Visuvaasigal Yaavarukkum Maadhirigalaaneergal.

8 eppadiyenil, Ungalidaththilirundhu Karththarudaiya Vasanam Makkedhoniyaavilum Agaayaavilum Dhoniththadhumallaamal, Naangal Adhaikkuriththu Ondrum Sollavendiyadhaayiraadhapadikku, Dhevanaippatrina Ungal Visuvaasam Engum Pirasiththamaayitru.

9 enenil, Avargaldhaame Engalaikkuriththu, Ungalidaththil Naangal Adaindha Piravesam Innadhenbadhaiyum, Jeevanulla Meyyaana Dhevanukku Oozhiyanjeyvadharku, Neengal Vikkiragangalai Vittu Dhevanidaththirku Mananthirumbinadhaiyum,

10 avar Mariththorilirundhezhuppinavarum, Inivarum Kobaakkinaiyinindru Nammai Neengalaakki Ratchikkiravarumaayirukkira Avarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesu Paralogaththilirundhu Varuvadhai Neengal Edhirpaarththukkondirukkiradhaiyum, Arivikkiraargale.
